summary: Simple mod that increases the height of males in the game
descriptionHtml:
I always found the NPCs in the game to be a little too short for my tastes and all the height mods I've looked for instead made NPCs even more shorter than they should. So thus I made this instead.
Races like Nords where males and females were of the same exact height before have been changed so males are now reasonably taller than females.

New heights changed:
M F
Altmer 1.085 1.08
Argonians -
Bosmer -
Breton -
Dark Elves 1.01 1.00
Imperials 1.03 1.02
Nords 1.04 1.03
Orcs 1.05 1.045
Redguards -


INSTALLATION
-----------------------------------------
just drop the ESP into the Data folder
author: reindeer51
